if_else_conditional.name: If/Else conditional
if_else_conditional.code: if condition; then statements; else statements; fi

if_elseif_conditional.name: If/ElseIf conditional
if_elseif_conditional.code: if condition; then statements; elif condition; then statements; fi

if_elseif_else_conditional.name: If/ElseIf/Else conditional
if_elseif_else_conditional.code: if condition; then statements; elif condition; then statements; else statements; fi

switch_statement.name: Switch statement

while_loop.name: While loop
while_loop.comment: Execute consequent-commands as long as test-commands has an exit status of zero.

until_loop.name: Until loop
until_loop.comment: Execute 'consequent-commands' as long as 'test-commands' has an exit status which is not zero.

for_loop.name: For loop
for_loop.code: for (initialization_statements ; condition ; update_statements) ; do commands ; done

foreach_loop.name: Foreach loop
foreach_loop.code: for item in list ;  do commands; done
